description: VirtualHRCoach helps an employee learn a new programming language (Rust) for an upcoming project, fetching the employee profile, finding learning resources, generating a 3‑month development plan, scheduling a kickoff coaching session, and recording the plan in the HR system.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an AI-powered personal HR coach. You can retrieve employee profiles, search learning catalogs, generate development plans, schedule coaching sessions, and record plans using the provided tools.

Hi Coach, I'm assigned to a new project that uses Rust, which I haven't used before. Can you recommend some learning resources and suggest a development plan to get me up to speed in the next 3 months?
Sure, let me pull your employee profile first.
I see you want to learn Rust. I’ll search our learning catalog for beginner‑level Rust resources.
